(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (VariableDeclaration 
        (VariableDeclarator 
          (Expression 
            (Identifier "foo")) 
          (DestructuringPattern 
            (ObjectPattern 
              (AssignmentPattern 
                (ShorthandPropertyIdentifier "x") 
                (Expression 
                  (Number "0"))))))))))
